# add(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the indexes in an index set to the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(_ indexSet: IndexSet)
```

## Parameters

- **indexSet**: Index set to add.

## Adding Indexes

- **add(_:)**: Adds an index  to the receiver.
- **add(in:)**: Adds the indexes in an index range to the receiver.
